subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Tampa Bay trailed Boston by 11 games through Aug. 7, but are 24-12 since, including a 9-2 victory in Thursday’s opener of a four-game set.
snippet: Tampa Bay trailed Boston by 11 games through Aug. 7, but are 24-12 since, including a 9-2 victory in Thursday’s opener of a four-game set.
